io.spine.server.model

Class MethodAccessChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.model.MethodAccessChecker

  • @Internal
public class MethodAccessChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    The checker of a Method access level.

    If the access level check fails, the warning will be output to the log. If the check passes, no action is performed.

    This class is effectively final since it has a single private constructor. Though the modifier "final" is absent to make it possible to create mocks for testing.

      • checkPublic

        public void checkPublic(java.lang.String warningMessageFormat)
        Checks that method access is public.

        If the access is not public, prints the warning to the log with the specified warningMessageFormat.

        warningMessageFormat should contain a placeholder for the method name.

        Parameters:
        warningMessageFormat - a formatted String representing the warning message
        See Also:
        String.format(String, Object...)
